trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality for a collection of table layout styles.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection> class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the columns or rows in an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
Classes derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection> are specialized as follows:
A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> aggregates column styles as a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> objects.
A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> aggregates row styles as a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> objects.
Most of the members of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection> are implementations of <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle"></xref> to the end of the current collection.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection.Add%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection"></xref>.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
style is already assigned to another owner.
You must first remove it from its current location or clone it.
Disassociates the collection from its associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref> and empties the collection.
This method cannot be overridden.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection.Clear%2A> method performs two main actions:

It disassociates the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection> from its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container so that the styles are no longer applied to the layout of the controls contained within the panel.
As a result, the table layout is reapplied to all the controls in the panel.
It empties the collection of all of its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle> objects.
As a result, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection.Count%2A> property is set to 0.
Gets the number of styles actually contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection"></xref>.
The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
The number of styles actually contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection"></xref>.
Gets or sets <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle"></xref> at the specified index.

Only one of the derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle> types, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>, can be stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection>.
An instance of a style can be associated only with a single container.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle"></xref> to get or set.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle"></xref> at the specified index.
The property value is already assigned to another owner.
You must first remove it from its current location or clone it.
Removes the style at the specified index of the collection.
This method cannot be overridden.
Before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle> is removed, it is disassociated from its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
As a result, the table layout is reapplied to all the controls in the panel.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle"></xref> to be removed.
For a description of this method, see the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref> method.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.

An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref>.

This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.

The position into which style was inserted.

The index of style if found in the list; otherwise, -1.

The zero-based index at which style should be inserted.
